original_text: Think about the birds. They do not plant seeds in the ground. They do not cut down plants to eat. They have no buildings to store food. But God gives them food to eat. You are much more valuable than the birds.
korean_text: 까마귀를 생각하라 심지도 아니하고 거두지도 아니하며 골방도 없고 창고도 없으되 하나님이 기르시나니 너희는 새보다 얼마나 더 귀하냐

sentences.original_text: They do not plant seeds in the ground.
They do not cut down plants to eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 먹기 위해 식물을 베지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: They have no buildings to store food.
But God gives them food to eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님께서는 그들에게 먹을 음식을 주십니다.

sentences.original_text: You are much more valuable than the birds.
